title: So...
body:
New featured game mode: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/122-pbe-update.html#nem1

What's everyone's thoughts?

replies.body: Should be good. Old news though.

More importantly, Roit thinks its good to make junglers more gimped than they already are.
"Stalker's Blade, Skirmisher's Sabre, Ranger's Trailblazer,  Poacher's Knife, Total cost increased to 850 from 750"

I dont think they understand how hard it is for junglers atm...

> [{quoted}](name=TerenceMckenna2g,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4EO6q1LH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-25T10:18:34.820+0000)
>
> More importantly, Roit thinks its good to make junglers more gimped than they already are.
> "Stalker's Blade, Skirmisher's Sabre, Ranger's Trailblazer,  Poacher's Knife, Total cost increased to 850 from 750"
> 
> I dont think they understand how hard it is for junglers atm...

This bothers me too. Some characters will be fine with it. However, others can't always clear that extra camp and need to back, especially for junglers who feel they need the Ranger's Trailblazer.
i'm excited. it's going to be interesting.
Yeh. I'm going to be all like:

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4EO6q1LH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:22:30.916+0000)
>
> Yeh. I'm going to be all like:

If I get Quinn I am trading with whoever gets Urgot.
Its just a conspiracy to make Urgot get play.
